LanguageData.LetterText_ShamblerGorehulk: Be careful, the group contains a feral ghoul hulk.
LanguageData.LetterText_ShamblerGorehulkPlural: Be careful, the group contains several feral ghoul hulks.
LanguageData.LetterText_ShamblerChimera: Be careful, the group contains a ghoulfied Yao Guai.
LanguageData.LetterText_ShamblerChimeraPlural: Be careful, the group contains several feral Yao Guai.
